repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine:3.6 

RUN apk add --no-cache \--update \
php7-ctype \
php7-dom \
php7-gd \
php7-iconv \
php7-json \
php7-xml \
php7-mbstring \
php7-posix \
php7-simplexml \
php7-xmlreader \
php7-xmlwriter \
php7-zip \
php7-zlib \
php7-pdo_mysql \
php7-curl \
php7-fileinfo \
php7-bz2 \
php7-intl \
php7-mcrypt \
php7-openssl \
php7-ldap \
php7-ftp \
php7-imap \
php7-exif \
php7-gmp \
php7-apcu \
php7-memcached \
php7-redis \
php7-pcntl \
php7-phar \
php7-opcache
